title: Budget 2025 live: Rachel Reeves says tax and spending changes based on ‘fair and necessary’ choices
summary: The Chancellor is set to deliver a crucial fiscal statement today at 12:30 PM, which is being seen as a pivotal moment for the Starmer government. This announcement will address key economic issues and potentially impact the government's future. Observers are keenly anticipating the implications of the statement on political and economic stability.

title: Beyond the classroom: the online alternative to traditional schooling
summary: Students at King’s InterHigh share how online schooling's flexibility and support have enabled them to navigate challenges successfully. They emphasize the personalized learning environment that caters to individual needs. As a result, they have been able to thrive academically and personally.

title: How online schools are tackling barriers to education
summary: Online schooling's immersive lessons and flexible qualifications are providing tailored support and innovation for students who struggled in traditional schools. This personalized approach helps address individual needs, enhancing their educational experience. As a result, many students are finding greater success and satisfaction in online learning environments.

title: The online IB diploma v traditional A‑levels: which is the best path for you?
summary: The international baccalaureate (IB) diploma offers students a broader educational experience compared to A-levels, covering a more diverse range of subjects. This approach helps students develop additional skills alongside their academic knowledge. The IB program is designed to prepare students for global citizenship and critical thinking.

title: Online schooling for families on the move: ‘You just need a computer, decent wifi and a quiet space’
summary: Balancing education with a world tour can be difficult for children. Online lessons offer a solution, allowing students to maintain their studies while traveling. This approach also helps them develop interpersonal skills and build lasting friendships.
